title: Happy birthday Spleen
content:
I have made you a special present; a remake of ShadowKeen1, with two weeks of work done on it!

[url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/ShadowKeen1.zip]levellord.toxicsheep.com/ShadowKeen1.zip[/url]

May you not get gruesomely murdered in the oncoming year!


A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Happy birthday Spleen
content:
It's Spleeny's birthday again?! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

Anyways, awesome work LL -- I like it a lot more than the first version! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Happy birthday Spleen
content:
Wow, that's amazing - excellent work!

I didn't realise you could even mod most of the stuff you've changed [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]
